newsitem.title: USA: Timeline Inc sees Q3 vs Q2 loss narrowing.
newsitem.headline: Timeline Inc sees Q3 vs Q2 loss narrowing.

text.p: Timeline Inc said late on Tuesday that it expected its third quarter losses to be lower than that its losses in the second quarter.
The second quarter loss was $0.38 per share.
A First Call estimate for the company's third quarter earnings was unavailable.

The financial management software company said separately that it is negotiating a contract with a U.S. manufacturing company that would generate "significant revenue over the next ten months if completed."
The company said in a release that it hoped to complete negotiations on the contract in several weeks.
